relevant_findings.general: Pale and bruised after hospitalization for a fall; unsteady while walking; uses a walker.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Soft, holosystolic murmur at the left border; no hepatojugular reflux
relevant_findings.edema: 1-2 pitting edema of the lower extremities
relevant_findings.neurological: Consistent with peripheral neuropathy; no lateralizing signs; feet without ulceration
